summary:

Ingredients:

1lb.  ground chicken

Creamy Cilantro Sauce:

1 cup fresh cilantro
1 small garlic clove
1/2 cup mayonnaise
‚Äê 1 tbsp cottage cheese
1 tbsp distilled white vinegar

Cooking Directions:

Combine cilantro, garlic clove, mayonnaise, cottage cheese, and vinegar in a food processor and blend till combined. 
Pop in the fridge to thicken and let flavors combine at least 30 minutes...
